title: unnaip-pOlavE
sahitya:
unnaip-pOlavE peNNaik-kaNDu vaNangum uLLam IghuvAi Om shaktiyE


anupallavi

  annaiyE amudE aruLE azhagE anbu mayamAna inba shankariyE


caraNam    ahamAyai ennai aDimai sheyyAmal Ashaip-pEigaLiDam mOsam pOghAmalE
sahasrAra siddhi tarum sAdhanattAl sarvam shuddha shakti jagam enrarindE
